snippet: The breach exposed two things the movie industry loathes — the piracy of films and details about executive compensation — and sent a ripple of dread across Hollywood.
abstract: Sony discloses additional aspects of breach of its computer systems, including leaking of internal documents containing pre-bonus annual salaries of several senior executives; breach has security experts and law enforcement authorities rattled, worried that Sony's difficulties may be indication that more such attacks are imminent.

byline.original: By BROOKS BARNES and NICOLE PERLROTH
byline.contributor: Brooks Barnes reported from Los Angeles, and Nicole Perlroth from San Francisco.

lead_paragraph: The breach exposed two things the movie industry loathes — the piracy of films and details about executive compensation — and sent a ripple of dread across Hollywood.

headline.main: Sony Films Are Pirated, and Hackers Leak Studio Salaries
headline.print_headline: Sony Breach, Now Wider, Draws Alert From F.B.I.
